Text: This gave me 'Patched.dx', a trojan that has dug itself so deep into my system files that none of the 10+ virus/malware programs I have tried so far can remove it (although most of them can detect it. Wierd). Going to reformat my computer today. Avoid.Like.Plague
This is also season 5...not 6 asshole...this thing apparently has a virus. Sorry manhippo
